Detailed Description

RowFile.

Class for reading line oriented files and parsing them out into vectors of strings easily.

bool RowFile::nextCStringRow ( std::vector< const char * > &  words  ) 

Chop the next row into words and return them in the vector.

char* memory in vector is owned elsewhere and will change after an calls to nextRow or nextLine.

Parameters:
words - vector to fill in with words.
Returns:
bool - false at EOF true otherwise.
